system.description: Forbiddance seals an area against all planar travel into or within it (teleportation, plane shifting, astral travel, ethereal travel, summoning). Such effects fail automatically. In addition, it damages entering creatures whose alignments are different from yours: identical alignment — no effect; different on one axis (law/chaos or good/evil) — 6d6 damage (Will half); different on both axes — 12d6 damage (Will half). You may set a password so that creatures speaking it avoid the damage. Dispel magic does not dispel forbiddance unless the dispeller's level is at least as high as your caster level. You can't have multiple overlapping forbiddance effects.

components.materialDescription: Holy water and rare incenses worth at least 1,500 gp, plus 1,500 gp per 60-foot cube. Password option: additional incenses worth 1,000 gp + 1,000 gp per 60-foot cube.
